intro: Solve the mystery and escape from the room
description:
Whew~, that was a long day! Tired, the Main Character jumps into his futon bed. Hoping to go on a date with Todomi in his dreams, he fell fast asleep.
He didn’t even notice the ghost staring at him in the darkness………

This time, the Main Character gets trapped in an escape game in his dreams. An old friend of Cape’s makes an appearance, shedding light on Cape’s mysterious past...err, sorta?
